mapper.select:
select info.room_name roomName ,res.name guestName ,to_char(res.check_in, 'YYYY-MM-DD') checkin ,res.hp hp
from reservations res
,
( select p.no pension_no ,p.name pension_name ,r.no room_no ,r.room_name room_name from pension p, rooms r where p.no = r.pension_no and p.no = #{pensionNo} ) info where res.room_no = info.room_no and ( res.status = 1 or res.status = 5 )

select to_char((trunc(sysdate, 'iw')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') weekFirst ,to_char((trunc(sysdate, 'iw')+6), 'YYYY-MM-DD') weekLast ,to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM') || '-01' monthFirst ,to_char(LAST_DAY(sysdate),'YYYY-MM-DD') monthLast from dual

select count(*) from reviews revi, reservations res, rooms rm where revi.no = res.no and res.room_no = rm.no and rm.pension_no = #{pensionNo} and revi.reg_date between to_date(#{weekFirst},'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{weekLast}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

select count(*) from reviews revi, reservations res, rooms rm where revi.no = res.no and res.room_no = rm.no and rm.pension_no = #{pensionNo} and revi.reg_date between to_date(#{monthFirst},'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{monthLast}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

select count(*) from reviews revi, reservations res, rooms rm where revi.no = res.no and res.room_no = rm.no and rm.pension_no = #{pensionNo} and to_char(revi.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
